ygData.subject: Re: Bards questing
ygData.msgSnippet: Now head on over to the bank in Freeport.  Open the door and go back by the bankers.  There is another door back there that is locked.  When I tried to open it
ygData.messageBody:
Now head on over to the bank in Freeport. Open the door and go back by the
bankers. There is another door back there that is locked. When I tried to
open it with my Gnomish lockpicks, it said that I lacked the skill to open
this door. But then again, I doubt that my pick skill is maxxed.

Sylly SongSynger
Bardette of 47 songs *yes*
<The Pantheon>
somewhere on Innoruuk...

p.s. a friend un-camped a char he had not played in months only to discover
that locked door. And yes, he was on the inside and could not get out!!
/petition Help! I am trapped in this room and cant get out!


----- Original Message -----
From: Mike Roach <mike.roach@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, February 18, 2000 9:33 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Bards questing


> From: Mike Roach <mike.roach@...>
>
> After attaining level 40 I decided to take my lock picks and head to
> Befallen so I could max out my final skill on the doors there.

> Yippie 100 skill in pick locks.
